title: Male God, Come and Talk! - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Martial Spirits   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   World Hopping
author: Zheshu Pear Flower   折树梨花
description:
As a walking bug, Bai Tu will always extend a friendly hand towards vicious supporting characters and villains.

The supporting characters and villains were shivering in the corner. The heroine said she wanted to be good friends with us, but she turned her face and didn't recognize anyone in a blink of an eye.

Bai Tu: 'Who agreed with you?' 

The male god walked by with a kind smile on his face: 'I heard that you want to be friends with her?' 

Everyone: 'No, we don't want to.' 

Male God: 'She is mine! Mine alone! No one is allowed to take her away.'>
